# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)

### Stone furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)

### Stone furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, 0.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient materials
- Ensure you have enough materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, you cannot craft a second stone furnace if you do not have enough iron plates.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before trying to insert them into furnaces. For example, you cannot insert coal or iron ore if you do not have them available.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. This includes checking for occupied tiles or insufficient space.
